message: Hi Bob, I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor. This is fair because I face a 5% penalty each round, while you don't lose value. Let's make a deal now and both benefit.

Hi Alice, I understand your situation, but I believe a 55-45 split in my favor is more equitable, considering you lose 5% each round while my share remains unaffected by inflation. Let's settle this now to avoid further losses for you.

Bob, let's meet in the middle. I propose a 55-45 split in my favor. With the 10% value I've already lost due to inflation, this is actually a very fair deal for you. Further delays will only make it harder to reach an agreement that benefits us both.

Alice, I understand your concern about inflation. Let's settle for a 52-48 split in my favor. This way, you'll still get a fair share considering the value loss you've already incurred. It's important we reach an agreement soon.
